thread.title: Dimitri Payet to leave West Ham: Unhappy star’s wife has moved back to France as midfielder tries to force West Ham owners to sell
thread.title_full: Dimitri Payet to leave West Ham: Unhappy star’s wife has moved back to France as midfielder tries to force West Ham owners to sell

author: sunsportonline
title: Dimitri Payet to leave West Ham: Unhappy star’s wife has moved back to France as midfielder tries to force West Ham owners to sell
text:
EFL Lud behaviour Dimitri Payet to leave West Ham: Unhappy star’s wife has moved back to France as midfielder tries to force West Ham owners to sell 
The Frenchman has refused to play for West Ham as he wants out of the London Stadium but the Hammers do not want to sell By Dan Pellegrini
